traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the Forest Master fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Forest Master has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Master of Beasts
entries: The Forest Master can comprehend and communicate with any Beast, even if the Beast knows no languages.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The Forest Master makes either two Hooves attacks, two Moon Bolt attacks, or one of each.

actions.name: Hooves
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Moon Bolt
entries: Ranged Spell atk +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) radiant damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Forest Master casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):
